website_summaries.verdict: A budget wireless charging pad that offers universal compatibility (Qi enabled devices and devices with receivers).
pros: The wireless charger is affordable, small, and lightweight, making it a great travel option
The slim design is attractive and the unit works as advertised
It also has safety features such as protection from overheating and surge protection and comes backed by an 18-month warranty
cons: Does not support Fast Charge and the LED lights are very bright

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COMPANY Please read my story
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger. It didn't work. I left a poor review. The company contacted me and asked permission to send me another charger for free. I agreed. The charger works GREAT. I totally respect a company that cares about their customers. This is the ONLY company that has ever read my review and reached out to fix the problem,. You should give them a chance. They stand behind their product. It is such an inexpensive charger and it keeps my iPhone X charged. I love it. I plan to buy this exact one for my husband when he upgrades his phone. Thank you, CHOETECH.
customer_reviews.author: nannychick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Perfect for my wife’s IPhone 8. And she can carry it easily in her laptop bag. Works in and out of case.
customer_reviews.author: M.Long

customer_reviews.title: CHOETECH iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly charging the new iPhone X with an OtterBox DEFENDER SERIES, great combo!
customer_reviews.author: James E.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a wireless car charger!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely charges fast! Very low heat! Fits perfectly inside my center console. 2015 Chevrolet Silverado 1500. Stays in place with rubber grips on the top of charger. Jan 2019 Update! Still working Great! I bought a few more for around the house too! Those are still working Great too!
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Pool Pro

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my iPhone 8. I was hesitant to trust wireless charging in the iPhone 8 because I read the reviews that talked about how the iPhone had to be positioned perfectly on the charging pad for it to work. I have not had that issue. As long as the complete width of the iPhone is contacting the pad, it will charge. I have tried all sorts of haphazard positions, and every angle works so long as the width of the phone is on the pad. The wireless charging is slower than charging through a cable, but I believe that is a problem in wireless charging technology across the board and not specific to this charger.
customer_reviews.author: SC_15

customer_reviews.title: One of them works great, the phone starts charging with no need to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these to place around the house. One of them works great, the phone starts charging with no need to position it in the right spot. One is so-so, I have to mess around with the position to make sure it is charging. The third hardly ever charges even though the light is on and it charges very slowly. All in all, I'd say the quality control is just not there. Since 2 out of 3 are instant garbage I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haraminac

customer_reviews.title: Update: No Longer Charges. Wobbly and the power cord keeps shutting off power to the unit
customer_reviews.text: Update: Ive had this only 5 weeks but the unit no longer charges my phone. Spend your money elsewhere. Buyer beware! —- Your phone will be wobbly when it sits on this because of those grey WiFi shapes on the top of it. They stick up a little which make it wobbly. The unit does not consistently have power. The cable connection to the unit appears, well, wobbly. I just keep this on my desk so it hasn’t been banged around. I think it is just dying after a month of infrequent use. I’d buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: WooPigFoodie

customer_reviews.title: Love wireless charging!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Works perfectly. I can charge my phone with a leather wallet case on it, with only minor adjustments to ensure charging. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: OtakusChaosTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because the plug on my motorola droid turbo wasn't always working to charge the phone. This product works great. Love it
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this product and was not happy, so I left my honest review and a few months later I got an email from their customer service team wanting to replace my charger. Turns out, I must have just gotten the oddball of the batch as the replacement works wonderfully. It does take a bit longer than a chord, but it just makes me do something productive while it's charging which I don't mind. The customer representative that reached out to me was really sweet as well, so if you do have any problems they will hook you right up. I greatly appreciate y'all and keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Made a Slight Modification
customer_reviews.text: Good so far! I've been looking for a wireless charger that works like the Funny Man cell phone hanger for the car. No luck. So, given the price, I decided to try this device. Pried off the feet and unscrewed the back. Drilled a couple of holes in one corner and fed a piece of nylon fishing line through it twice. Then reassembled, positioned it in the holder and tightened the line to hold it where it needed to be on the Funny Man to work with my Galaxy S9. One day in it seems to be working like I want.
customer_reviews.author: Air Steve

customer_reviews.title: Meltdown! What happened?
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was anxious to use this charger with my new Pixel 3XL. I use this bedside to charge overnight. So last night, I smelled burning electronics, so I went to grab my new phone, thinking that was the problem. The phone was burn-the-hand HOT!!! The charger was untouchable hot and was starting to melt. Yikes!!! I hope this didn't damage my phone. We have another wireless charger that works perfectly fine. This could be VERY DANGEROUS. Oh well, the house didn't burn down. I'll give this star because of the potential for disaster.
customer_reviews.author: <<<synthpulse>>>

customer_reviews.title: Is there power in the air?
customer_reviews.text: Remarkable device. Cheap, cab substitute different cable lengths through USB to Micro USB cables, unit clearly indicates when it's charging and works with many supported devices from both Apple iOS and Google Android perspectives (but check the notes!). My folks referred to this device as "21st Century" which I got a kick out of. I guess if you want to impress people unfamiliar with this technology, it's a small price to pay but I find it worth it based on its convenience and not having to always hunt for cables when I need to charge my mobile device. This device is definitely 4 stars or higher based on two months of usage.
customer_reviews.author: E. R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Move it the tiniest bit away from that sweet spot and it's 3
customer_reviews.text: Charges my iPhone X at 7 watts maximum measured using a Kill-A-Watt IF you have it in EXACTLY the right spot, case or no case on the phone / naked phone. Move it the tiniest bit away from that sweet spot and it's 3, 4 watts. Oh and by the way that sweet spot isn't centered on the charging pad, must be off center a bit. So it's not like you can just pop the phone down center it up and know it'll work - a bit. It doesn't :( Overnight it maintained charge on my phone but certainly did not charge it up. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Dresser

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable charger
customer_reviews.text: I found that this charging pad makes it hard to get the charging receiver into the right position. And when I do set down my iPhone with a Qi receiver it can take 20 seconds or longer to start charging. And there are times when it stopped charging overnight, leaving me with an iPhone with very little charge when I expecting a full charge. It has a bright blue light which stays on the entire time while charging. Having it near my bed at night is disruptive, so I'd have to cover up that light with some tape to at least dim it quite a bit. I found alternatives products to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan Stehling

customer_reviews.title: Charger likely caused me to replace my phone battery.
customer_reviews.text: This charger had reliably charged my phone for about 18-months. Recently, like other reviewers, I found my iPhone X battery had bulged out to pop the screen out. I had to pay $70 for a new battery. Is it the fault of the phone, or was this charger overcharging my phone night after night for over a year? In this case, I have to blame the charger. Like other reviewers, my charger would not cut off once the phone was charged. I just purchased a more expensive Anker charger in the hopes it provides better charging.
customer_reviews.author: SadMax

customer_reviews.title: Perfect--How are others charging $50 or more for the same functionality?
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Looks nice. What's not to like? The price difference between this and one in the Apple store or even just most others on Amazon is enormous. They don't do anything that this one can't do, and they don't look any nicer IMHO. So why are they SOOOOO much more expensive? I guess the only thing I would change is to remove the LED that lights when the phone is charging because I like to have this next to my bed, but a piece of electrical tape took care of that. This is the cheapest one I could find and it charges my IPhone 8+ quickly and efficiently, with a case on. Why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: Inswichlicuor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Total junk
customer_reviews.text: Stops working fairly quickly. I bought two of these and am sending both back. I very rarely write reviews but this really is garbage, at least for an iPhone 8. It’s super touchy and you have to move the phone around a bunch before you find a spot that will charge. Twice I went to sleep with the phone charging only to wake up and find my phone didn’t charge.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Poor Charging Pad for Samsung Galaxy  S9 phones
customer_reviews.text: Slowly charges my Samsung Galaxy S9 and then does not keep a charge long lasting vs. plug in. Plus, you have to lay your phone down on the pad very precisely and make sure it's out of the way from being bump or moved, otherwise it will stop charging. So there is no way of changing it in your car unless you are mounting it down. I don't know whether this charging pad is defective, works better with the IPhone or what. But I would appreciate if someone from the company company reached out to me. Because I brought one a couple of months ago and used it less than 5 times. I think it's to late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia

customer_reviews.title: Three years strong!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wireless charger for 3 years and use it on a daily basis. The blue led light on the side that indicates it's charging doesn't light up 100% of the time anymore, but I can tell that my phone is charging. I bought this charger b/c it was larger than others. Like most wireless chargers, it can be fiddly about how you place your phone on it, but otherwise it works great. It works fine with an iphone with a thick otter defender case.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Chicklet

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch on the attention to details
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that I really enjoyed about the wireless charger is the rubber padding on top of the charger. It keeps the phone in place while the body is built with smooth matte black. Overall, it's an aesthetic touch. My phone has a glass back surface (iPhoneX) and I don't have any case for it at the moment so the extra friction as so I don't accidentally knock it off my night stand is a very nice touch. The platform of the wireless charging platform is very distinctively marked as well so there isn't a need for that clumsy moment of looking for the spot to charge your phone. Overall the extra touch didn't go unnoticed.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Wen

customer_reviews.title: Reliable charging for an iPhone (just make sure you have a USB charger)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put on my desk at work for charging my iPhone 8. It works really well. I set the phone down on the pad (it's inside a leather Apple iPhone case) and the charging begins immediately. I haven't conducted any time tests, but intuitively it feels like it charges about as fast as the plug-in lightning port charger that comes with the phone. Note: As per the description, this device does not include the actual charger. It's just the pad and the cable. You'll need an USB charger (such as the one that comes packaged with an iPhone) to get it working.
customer_reviews.author: CNYGamer

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 11 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: So just stopped working after 11 months of use. Up until that point I loved not having to plug my phone in to charge it at night. Worked even with my Spigen case on the phone. Does not charge as fast as plugging it in with the C connector on my LG G7 but that's to be expected. Worked ok when just doing it over night which is all I really used it for. Reliability is going to be the issue with all the cheap versions out there but at the cost can just buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for almost a week now and just love the convenience of being able to just pick up my phone if I receive a text or phone call. No more worrying about if the charger cord will be yanked out or having to unplug phone before answering a call. I have the Samsung Galaxy S10e and it works great on this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, simple, wireless charger. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger due to it's affordability. I was wanting to place a few wireless chargers throughout the house, and needed on especially for the end table beside my husband's chair. This one works better than expected. It's small, takes up little space, and is very simple looking so it blends right in. It also doesn't seem to be as finicky as some chargers are about phone placement. It's not a fast charger, but is perfect for him to lay his phone on as he sits and watches TV. So far seems like a good, solid charger.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Shafer

customer_reviews.title: A little underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for the price, but it charges slowly. I expect it only does 5W or 7W. It says 10W on the device, but it never charges very quickly. It is great if you are charging overnight, but if you are using the phone, say playing music or using Waze, it does not keep up.
customer_reviews.author: William StevensTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the charger a few days, but it's working very well. It is very easy to position the iPhone correctly. When it's in the right spot, the phone beeps and the battery-charging icon appears on the screen. Also a little light on the charger indicated it is charging. I have checked the charger, the phone and the wall AC converter, and none feel at all warm. This is not a "fast charger," and I read that the non-fast ones are actually slower than the wired chargers, but that's fine for my use since I typically only charge my phone overnight.
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 4 months later.
customer_reviews.text: I usually try to review electronics after I've had them for a little while. This product WAS great. I liked how it didn't have a bright light, so it didn't inhibit sleep. It charged really fast. Until now. Four months later, and it completely stopped working. A few weeks ago, it started having issues. It would only charge when it felt like working (and we did try it on multiple different phones)... but now it just doesn't work at all. I'm bummed because this is one of the only products like it that didn't have a bright obnoxious light.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Decent charger, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: It's really just OK. Build quality seems really good but it tends to get warm and stay warm long after removing my phone. Charges at a decent rate with the right input. Not blown away by it but not terribly disappointed. EDIT: I had to add another star for the exceptional customer service. The company contacted me when they saw my dissatisfied review, gave me a few suggestions and worked with me to come to a good resolution. Product seems to be doing fine still and working well but the customer service is amazing. Very happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Damage Inc XLE

customer_reviews.title: Worked less than 1 year and stopped charging. - Replaced by company
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I got the new iPhone 8 last November. I didn't start using right away but when I finally did it worked great. However, over the past few weeks has been harder and harder to find the sweet spot that will make the phone begin charging. Finally will not charge at all. I would have expected it to last much longer as it was not abused in any way. Update: I was recently contacted by the company and they sent a replacement of the next generation charger. I have not used the new one yet but am very appreciative of them replacing the bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charging is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wireless charging is so convenient! I got my iPhone 8 last Thanksgiving, and shortly after I bought a stand-up charger to use as my bedside charger, and found it to be a little difficult (and loud) to find my phone in the dark, knocking it over constantly. This is so much more easier. I just place my phone down, and forget about it. (The old charger now stays on my desk at work) There's a small blue LED light to confirm that it's charging properly. It's not bright enough to keep you awake or anything. It's great picking up my phone (which I use as an alarm clock) without ripping any cords out of the wall too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I have a battery case and I do not enjoy wrestling the tight case off my phone every night ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a battery case and I do not enjoy wrestling the tight case off my phone every night for charging. The Choetech wireless charging pad magically charges both the phone and the case over night while it sits innocently on my bed stand. This miracle of science somehow keeps my phone fully charged without wires. My previous phones also used battery cases, which would eventually stop working because of taking them on/off the phone so much. Great product at 1/3 the cost of the similar solution offered by the battery case company.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but could use a few refinements...
customer_reviews.text: This charger works fine with my iPhone X - but there is room for improvement: the blue LED that lights up is so bright that I had to put tape over it to prevent the room from lighting up. Would be nice to be able to disable it, or make it less bright. Also, if my phone receives a text, it vibrates itself off of the charger zone and my phone is not charged in the morning. It would benefit from something that keeps the phone securely in place.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sondreal

customer_reviews.title: Have you seen my foot?
customer_reviews.text: These charge reasonably quickly and take wear and tear off your charger port on phone. The only gripe I have is there are four little feet on the bottom, my unit must have suffered an amputation because now I only have three feet. This kind of makes the unit teeter back and forth, this in turn makes my phone freak out. So to correct this I cut up a foam earplug and replaced the foot. All is hunky dory again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: The complained of light on this devise
customer_reviews.text: I'm amused by these complaints. In order to be disturbed by this small blue light that activates when the device is charging your iPhone, the phone would have to be near your bed while you are sleeping, preferably at eye level since the length of your phone acts as a roof over the device, and hence the light, thereby covering up most of the light's distribution in the room, and your bedroom would have to be pitch black dark, in order for the small light to have any effect on the room's ambient light level.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Was annoying but now completely useless.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for awhile but when you remove the wire from the jack, after a few times you will end up pushing the jack in and now I can't use it anymore. On a second note, the blue light is annoying if you're charging at night since the light doesn't go away. I would not recommend it because of the jack plugging issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: A fine little charging pad, great use as a travel charger!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second CHOTECH wireless charging pad. I bought one for home use and another for work. Both charging pads work great! I am using them with my Galaxy S7 Edge and Galaxy S9+. The slim design allows my to throw it in my bag if needed and when not traveling, it is conveniently small and unobtrusive. Charging speed is on par with normal cellphone chargers, still trying to do a comparison with a fast charging pad. Overall, very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Simple Little Charger
customer_reviews.text: I was offered a product free of charge in exchange for an honest review. This is a great, no-frills little charger. Absolutely no setup required, just take it out of the box and plug it in. It does a charge a bit slow, so if you're hooked on your phone you may endure withdrawals. But it's very easy to just set your phone down and forget about it charging. For just over thirteen dollars, you can't do much better. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Tingle

customer_reviews.title: Does what it does, with sacrifice to speed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for the no-longer-working charging port on 2013 Nexus 7. Pros: Ease of use. Just plug it into the outlet and place device on top. Green light is indicative of charging. Cons: Charging speed cannot be compared with straight plug-in charging port connections. Since the charging port no longer works, this is the only means for charging the device. Longevity is yet to be determined.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. A. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cordless charging pad.
customer_reviews.text: purchased as a gift for my wife, she uses this multiple times daily and has not failed us once. very good value for money and very easy to use, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: bina tuladahr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Even charges through a leather case
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this unit. I have a stand that holds my iPhone and charges my Apple Watch with space for an Apple Pencil and AirPods. I put the wireless charger on the display stand for the iPhone (will need some double-sided tape to secure the position) and it works great! I have a thick leather case for my iPhone from Pad&Quill and this charger charges through the case too. Just what I needed. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick D

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, my phone won’t wirelessly charge
customer_reviews.text: Thoughtthis was great next to my bed. I able to just drop my phone (after I took off the metal part of my case) and it would charge. Let it charge all night and it was great. Fast forward 7 months. Stopped working. Tried another phone and it works with another phone. My iPhone 8 wireless charging is messed up. Not sure if this caused it or the daily wireless charge did. Edited my review because this works, but do t know if this caused my wireless charging to malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rollo

customer_reviews.title: It works, it really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about antennas receiving HD content since last time I used an antenna it was a bent coat hanger. Needless to say I bought this thing and it works. It took some adjustments to get the best signal. I tried indoors, but it was getting like 6 channels. Once I took it outside and tapped it to the outside wall with ducktape I got like 20 channels. Position is key. The cable is long and thin enough to fit between the seams of my closed window so it worked out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cito

customer_reviews.title: ChoeTech wireless phone charger
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time (3 days) and was well packaged and easy to use. It works fine, but it is not a rapid charger, so don't be confused. It charges slowly but certainly. I am very satisfied with my purchase and would purchase again. I even received a followup email explaining more about the charger and what it is not meant to do as well as the 18 month warranty. Again, I am quite satisfied with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: dirtmaster

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: This charges my iPhone XR remarkably fast, especially when you consider I have my phone in an OtterBox Defender. The high-speed USB port on my computer provides enough power to run this charger well. YMMV, but this is a great charger for on my desk at work. I can just sit at my desk, put my phone down and it charges, and grab it quickly when I leave. I also like the charging indicator light on it. It lets me know that I've got my phone on it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger with just a single issue.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent charger which does a great job. Easy to see if you placed your phone in the right or wrong position. The only drawback is that once it reaches 100% it starts to drain and will not initiate the charge sequence again. Maybe that's my phone but I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff b.

customer_reviews.title: Finicky about position of your phone
customer_reviews.text: More often than not, I come back to find out that my phone didn't charge. Even when it looks pretty squarely placed on the charger, I often need to move it around several times in order to get the charging started. Definitely more time-consuming than just plugging in a cable. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: This device is okay
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other wireless chargers I’ve used this one seems to be the worst. It charges devices just fine and just as fast, but you need to position the device just right to get it charging. Others I’ve used I just put it down and it’s good, this one I’ve had to adjust my phones position multiple times before it would charge. Still a good deal and a way better option than buying the over priced brand names. I think the Samsung charger is $50, I got this for $20.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Good for charging
customer_reviews.text: Here's some pros and cons: Pros: The square shape makes it easier to set a device on. Works to charge a phone easily, and has a comparatively small current loss, in other words, it's one of the more efficient charge pads I've used. Connections are stable and the cord socket does not move around like in some lower quality brands. Cons: The raised rubber gray grips cause the phone to not make stable surface contact. While this does not in any way effect charging, it makes the phone rock around if it's being used at the same time it's being charged. This causes the phone to have momentary losses of charge connection.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas C.

customer_reviews.title: Great - a little slow to charge but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use it over night to charge my phone. It charges slowly, but makes it to 100% by the time I am up in the morning. It actually charges through fairly thick cases too. Which will slow down the charging process. But who keeps their phone without a case anymore? Good charger for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It makes a constant beeping noise, almost like a cricket.
customer_reviews.text: It charges without issues, that’s not a problem, but when it is charging it’ll constantly make a beeping noise that you’d only hear if you’re within about 3 feet of it. Almost sounds like a cricket and it’s frustrating because it’s right next to my bed on the nightstand. It didn’t start until about a few weeks after I bought it. I won’t be purchasing anything else from this seller unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Vesna Bejdic

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for phones - however, leaving a 2-star rating because it does not work as advertised with airpods. I even bought a powerful brick in case there wasn't enough power going to the wireless charger, but it simply isn't compatible with the Airpods wireless charging case. Very disappointed for this reason - it was the #1 reason I bought this wireless charger. UPDATE: Haven't had a chance to try the replacement, but updated the review to 5 stars for the customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Dizfunctions

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cheap Portable Wireless Charges
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy portable device for when you want to put your phone down for a bit a and charge is while you are doing something else. In my picture, you can see that it is hardly bigger stein a standard wireless keyboard mouse. You fave to try to make sure it is in the direct middle or else if wouldn't charge, I did not have high hopes for these base d on the price, but I like them enough I got my family each one so we old all have the. My ownly complaints is that is it very very hard to use while charging,.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: charges great, but positioning tempermental
customer_reviews.text: My phone stopped charging with a regular plug in charger, so I purchased this one and it charges my phone great! It does not charge my phone (Droid turbo 2) fast (although my phone is equipped with fast charge), but does charge my husbands Samsung s6 fast. My only issue is that you have to make sure it is charging and position the phone just right for it to charge. I have set it on there several times, thinking it was charging and it was not.
customer_reviews.author: Lora H.

customer_reviews.title: Some nights it just doesn't charge, flashes blue light when it isn't working.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of wireless charging, but this devise is un reliable. I do have a case on my phone which might be part of the problem, but its weird. I will put it on the charge and it vibrates to say "hey i'm connected" Then I wake up in the middle of the night and it is flashing blue light and not charging. This happens about 1/3 of the time. I have stopped using it and am using my cord again. I wish I had thought of returning it before the window closed. Maybe without the case there wouldn't be this problem, but its easier to plug my phone in than remove the case every night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There’s no doubt that it works. Two issues have ...
customer_reviews.text: *Update* The manufacturer, Choetech, reached out after this review to offer me their updated unit. This one has been working flawlessly to this point. Quality has improved greatly, and much more thought has gone into it. I greatly appreciate Choetech reaching out to me and hope this helps everyone else out there. -Old review- There’s no doubt that it works. Two issues have been noted. First, the phone is very finicky with its placement on the pad. Secondly, the blue light can be a bit much when you’re trying to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Squishy_MW3

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Works well with my iphoneX and wife's Samsung galaxy, even when not "perfectly" centered. For the price an excellent deal. Just wish they included the power adapter, VERY STRANGE THAT THEY DON'T. It requires a higher power adapter than the normal ones that come with phones. Read the requirements closely before ordering and order the adapter at the same time so you won't have to wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Received replacement
customer_reviews.text: I'm changing this review several months later from 1 to 5 stars. Unexpectedly the company reached out to me and even though i returned the old charger, they sent me a new updated model. This new one works great and i've had it for a few weeks with no issue. (Previous review: Doesn't charge any of the phones even though it shows charging icon. Tried with a different base and does the same thing. When phone was on the charging pad, the screen got messed up like it was warpin or too hot.)
customer_reviews.author: Ms B

customer_reviews.title: Meltdown
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this charger to add to a Choetech Stadium charger that I've had for some years (which still works well). I've been very pleased with the charger until now. Realized a few mornings ago that my iPhone wasn't fully charged. On investigation I found that the charger had started to melt itself down. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Johann Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Had some issues
customer_reviews.text: After this review the company did send a new one, but i went back to the wall charger. I got this a while ago and it worked great at first!!! I loved it!!! Recently it’s become more temperamental. With several nights it not charging, even though is says on my phone it was charging when I put the phone on. Even if the phone is nudged a millimeter it will stop charging.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great compatibility
customer_reviews.text: Compact, not heavy, very convenient. Picks up charge immediately, regardless of the case. Wish it had quickcharge capability but for $12, this is a steal. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AntJustAnt

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy charging
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during Prime Day as I know others who have been happy with this type of charger. I was pleasantly surprised--first of all - no special connector needed and it charges quickly. This review had me rate it for travel. I hadn't really thought about that (!!!) but will be traveling soon and plan to take it with me. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia D

customer_reviews.title: What a satisfying purchase !
customer_reviews.text: These charging pads are amazing. They work great. Have them on both of our night stands. What a pleasure to just walk in and lay the phone on the pad and know it's charging. No more trying to plug that annoying little plug in the jack on the bottom of the phone. My iPhone 8 has an otterbox defender case and it charges great even with the beefy otterbox on it. My wife's iPhone 8 has a backshell protection and works equally as good. Just plain and simply said "GLAD we bought these charging pads". Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Les Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: I first gave this product a better review but the cord that came with it didn’t work so I bought another cord and it keeps burning them up. The charger doesn’t respond and I’ve used several cubes and cords and it works for about 10 mins then it just stops working and then the cord and cube have to be replaced to get it to charge again. I lost the box so I can’t return it. This thing is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Firestick M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for my Nexus 7
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically to recharge my Nexus 7, 2nd generation. However, when I place the tablet on the pad, the blue light just blinks a few times and stops. The documentation that comes with it is almost nonexistent and there is little more information on the website. At a minimum, if this company really cared about its customers, it would tell us what the blinking behavior means. I emailed the company and received no response. I would be willing to change this rating if the company would at least respond. As it is, I have no alternative but to return this for something that works.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but becomes annoying to clean
customer_reviews.text: Functionally this charger worked just fine for my iPhone 8 Plus (even with a case on and at odd angles). Unfortunately, I ended up switching to an Anker wireless charger because the rubbery material on top of this one shows finger prints, dust, and anything else it comes into contact with a little too easily. I felt like I was always cleaning it, which eventually became too annoying to keep it around. I didn't return it because it does exactly what it's advertised to do, so if appearance isn't an issue for you, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Outman

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace one from another manufacturer that just didn't last. After getting the first one (from the other manufacturer) it lasted less than a year so they gladly replaced it. The replacement lasted even less, so I decided to get another one in a different brand. This one works great, It connects each time and I think it will last for awhile!
customer_reviews.author: jcyawo

customer_reviews.title: Lay my iPhone on the charging pad and let it charge no cables to mess with
customer_reviews.text: I use this Choetech Wireless Charger Pad with my Antye Qi Charging case to charge my iPhone 7 plus and it works great. I've use this pad many times and it works great. I give it 5 stars for reliability. This is an update after using it for about a month now and it continues to work flawlessly with no issues whatsoever. I would recommend this wireless charger to anyone looking for an inexpensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Brown

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This worked pretty good for about four months and then just stopped working. Pretty disappointed, I enjoyed putting my phone on the charger out having to plug it in. Update, they gave me a replacement charger that was supposed to be an updated model. It was pink, so not the same thing I ordered. But it seems to work so far. Unfortunately I had to get a different replacement before then sent me this one so I really don’t have much opportunity to utilize it. I upgraded them to three stars because they at least went through the effort of trying to get me a replacement product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Charger suddenly died after 8 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about a year and a half ago, but only began using it about 8 months ago. It’s been plugged in on my desk the entire time, and has hardly moved. Today, it suddenly died and would not charge my phone at all. Until this, it was a great little cheap Qi charger, but anything that suddenly dies, despite being taken care of, is a bad product in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an iPhone 8 Plus, charger works great. The charger even works through thick phone cases as well not just thin cases, there are some chargers that require certain cases to be able to work fine. This is the best you can get for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Silvio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Charger For The Task At Hand
customer_reviews.text: So I'm going to compare this charger to the. 1. This charger has a larger surface area, thus less wiggling to get it to charge. 2. This charger charges at 7.5W while the 10W charger is a little faster, the difference is almost negligible. 3. Both chargers work phenomenally with Spigen cases with both my iPhone 8 and my Galaxy Note 5. In conclusion, get this charger if you want a charger that would work with any Qi Enabled device. I found it to be more value than the Fast wireless chargers on the market...even the Fast one offered by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Pad is good ... USB cable is cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Pad is good ... USB cable is cheap! After approximately 3 months of use the USB connector end that inserts into the pad is curling up. This is indicative to the pad slowly heating, as most Qi pads do; however, also leads to the cable being of low quality. This issue is not isolated to a single unit; but, both that were purchased and utilized by 2 separate individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Charging volts low compared to more brand names.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't charge very fast but good for overnights. EDIT: Was contacted due to negative review. Company offered to send me a new charger of different brand that supports fast charging. Am very satisfied with these guys. It's rare to get such great and helpful support online in a world full of unnecessary hatred. Will reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in Nov 2017. The first version didn’t last. It was too late to return as I was past my return window. Emily from Choetech reached out to me and agreed to send me an updated version and it has been working flawlessly! Very impressed with the excellent customer service! The updated wireless charger that they sent me works flawlessly with my iPhone X. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Princelashawn

customer_reviews.title: I feel dumb for not getting this earlier
customer_reviews.text: At just $15 when I bought this, it's only been here a week and I already feel like a caveman when I plug my phone in. Wish I had bought this as soon as I got a remote charging phone instead of waiting months. Works right out of the box with my older phone and my new iPhone X, seems to charge as fast as most plugs and is small and light so it leaves a tiny and unobtrusive footprint on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great Response
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have indicated in similar reviews, the charger died within months of purchase with only minimal usage. I bought two for my wife and I. I plugged it different outlets, put a new cord on it. Finally, they just quit working after having been used only a handful of times. I really liked the product at first because it can just sit on my desk with minimal space. Very disappointed because I was going to buy more for my family. UPDATE: Great response. I really appreciate the timely response! Thanks for sending out two new chargers for me. Hopefully they do the trick. Perfect stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: tical00111

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad charger for Pixel 3
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. A little difficult to make sure it is charging. Need to make sure the phone is placed correctly. Not a fast charge. UPDATE: I was surprised recently to receive a replacement device, which I assume is an upgraded version. I haven't had a chance to use it yet since I don't currently have a wireless chargeable phone. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: George Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Using it with my LG V30, for the price I was worried it would either be more picky or not work with my case... I was wrong! This charger works with both of the cases I've tried, it works every time I set my phone down and after the first few days I stopped double checking its charging (I really didn't have much faith, sorry!) Great product and working great still after 2+ weeks!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with plug. USB cable and pad only.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come with a wall plug. It’s just the cable and charging pad. So if you thought you were going to charge your phone think again. You’ll need to take the wall plug from another charger of your or buy an additional one. Kinda lame. The instructions show the cable being plugged into their brand wall plug. But there isn’t one in the box. You literally cannot use this without an additional purchase. Buyer beware. Also the charging pad has a WiFi logo or something and it’s raised up so the phone doesn’t sit flat, it rests on top of the raised part. Maybe it needs a slight air gap.
customer_reviews.author: shigglyboo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an extra charger for the living room in my basement and it’s still working today and I use it all the time to get those extra charges in also when I have people over they use them too so it comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Allam

customer_reviews.title: Great Seller and Product
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The company here went above and beyond to address our concerns with the charger. They sent an upgraded replacement that has been working perfectly so far. They get an A+ for being completely professional in taking care of the customer - thank you! ORIGINAL REVIEW: Dozens of reviews stating the device stopped working after a few uses or minutes. I’ve had the same issue. I’ve woken up with half charged phone several times. I’ve tried multiple cables, charging blocks, and outlets. Never seems to just work.
customer_reviews.author: Ed B.

customer_reviews.title: Let it charge, let it charge, let it charge
customer_reviews.text: This product came packaged nicely and works well. I have never had a charger like this so I can not compare it to any others, but I will say that I am as picky as they come. If a product feels cheap, or looks it, I send it back. However, this product is made well and feels like it will last years to come. Charging doesn’t take long for my mophie case. Most importantly, it’s convenient and at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: C.J

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Nice size, looks good on night stand!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Works well with iPhone XR. You receive the charger and chord. You provide the USB plug (which everyone has a few around!). Simple..just put the phone on the charger and it works. So much easier than messing with the plug the phone comes with. I've had it for a year and it started not charging all of a sudden. I contacted the seller and they sent me a new one in two days. Super great customer service. The warranty is 18 months, not bad at all. Overall, I've very happy with the purchase and will get another one for my wife's phone.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shark

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Iphone 8!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding value! I have an Iphone 8 with wireless charging. Having never used wireless charging before, I wasn’t convinced that a product so inexpensive would be any good. It doesn’t come with a wall plug for the USB cable, but if your like me, you have collected many over the years from various rechargeable electronic devices. Other name brands are selling wireless chargers for 3x as much. Instead of buying one expensive one of the name brands, I’m going to purchase a few more CHOETECH wireless chargers to have around the house. 😁
customer_reviews.author: nonesuch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: While this charger is easy to use, no need to plug your cell phone and it immediately starts charging, I do have a problem. The charger gets warm/hot really fast and I'm afraid to use it because of that. Charging my cell phone with the regular plug-in cable doesn't do that after so I think there has to be something not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa A. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Works on iPhone 8 Great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my iPhone 8 even with the case on it. It seems to charge faster than when I use a cable. The only issue I had was that it was a little picky about which USB wall adapter I used. Might have something to do with the wattage. At this price I was able to buy 2. One for home and one for work.
customer_reviews.author: MsquaredM

customer_reviews.title: Very intermittent charging
customer_reviews.text: The charger always recognizes my iphone8, however it only rarely will charge the phone for any length of time. It worked well the first couple days. The last week or so I have woken up to get ready for work and my phone is dead or almost dead from it not charging overnight. The phone always makes the charging noise via the phone and the blue light on the actual charger comes on, but that doesn’t mean anything I’ve come to learn.... id look elsewhere for a charger
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: packaging was great, item was small lightweight didn’t take up a ...
customer_reviews.text: Received, packaging was great, item was small lightweight didn’t take up a lot of room, offered blue light indicator as phone was charging. I did not keep because it made my phone extremely hot an while it performed as described the charging was rather slow. I didn’t want to take a chance with my phone so I did return but may have just been nothing but the temperature my phone got while charging had me concerned.
customer_reviews.author: swhite1294

customer_reviews.title: A great minimal sleek well designed device!
customer_reviews.text: Face refgognition? It’s a wireless charger! This works so well for our iPhone Xs phones. It even integrates well with the cradles I made for our bedsides. Nice unobtrusive LED and a grippy rubbery pattern ensures that it wont easily slide off. I just ordered fourt more to position throughout our home for visitors, us, and guests.,
customer_reviews.author: Lek

customer_reviews.title: Tried to charge a number of different types of things...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger hoping it would charge my Amazon Fire 7 tablet, Iphone 5s, Samsung tablet, Nook tablet, certain lithium batteries, and Sony Xperia. None of these products produce any type of recharging. It was worth a try. Each of these had a charging plug that would not take a charge. My intention was maybe a wireless "Qi" charger could at least give a slow charge to any of these but did not. I hope that this post helps others who are in the same situation that I am with the above products.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: So this little guy sits in my car now and easily charges my 8 ( with Silk case on)
customer_reviews.text: Since the iPhone 8 needs yet another adaptor to charge while also playing music through the lightening port, I figured I'd take advantage of the wireless charging feature instead. So this little guy sits in my car now and easily charges my 8 ( with Silk case on). Also, I knew this would end up in my car so it being "grippy" was the deciding factor. I may buy more just because they work so well (like I mentioned, even with a case) and are at an amazing price point.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to quickly grab and set down my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these, one for the living room and one for my nightstand. I love being able to quickly grab and set down my phone without plugging and unplugging cables. It charges fine and without heating through my simple case. I will say that it charges slower than the cable that comes with the Galaxy S7 (like any third party cable you use with it), but for the convenience trade off, it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Claire C.

customer_reviews.title: REVISED July 2019 _Waste of Money (Did Love it!)
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful accessory. Great design and so easy to use. I love it! UPDATE: I went from 5 star to 1 star because the unit stopped working after 3 months. UPDATE 2019 July : Out of the clear blue the company contacted me and sent a new charger. Have to say the customer service is amazing! In all fairness to the company when I revised my review to 1 star I had not contacted them regarding the failure of the unit after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy a type 'A' wireless charger for my LG Fiesta 2 LTE and even with a thin plastic case on the phone, this charger works quickly. It gets a little warm while charging, but once the phone is charged, it cools down. It's not hard to find the 'sweet spot' because the blue light on the side comes on when it's charging. My picture is 2, one of the charger itself and of my phone on top. Very convenient and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great with iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of these with my new iPhone X and found they are compatible and work great. I'm surprised at how fast they charge, as I expected it to be just a trickle. I also like that the design of these is understated compared to a lot of competing products. The only downside is the unnecessary bright blue light - but I just covered the lights on our bedside units with black gaff tape, problem solved. I've now bought a bunch of these, placing them around the house and my office for convenient casual charging.
customer_reviews.author: Lightning Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Reliable wireless charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger for my husband. His Samsung wasn’t charging very well through the cord , the port is damaged, causing it to intermittently charge. He’s been using the Choetech wireless charger for about a week and though it’s not a quick charge it gets the job done overnight. I’d highly recommend if your looking for a good wireless charger but if you need a speedy charge it may not be the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: JulieMoon86

customer_reviews.title: Get the fast charger
customer_reviews.text: **** edit This company was kind enough to reach out and send a replacement. It works well and is a lot less finicky with placement. I’d recommend ordering the fast charge version This product works OK. It doesn’t charge as fast as other brands I’ve had and it’s a lot more finicky with how you set your phone on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: CMW17

customer_reviews.title: Charges through my case
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a charger that I wouldnt need to remove my case for it to work. This one does that! you do have to make sure your phone is centered for it to charge. If you just throw it on and walk away it may not be aligned properly which leads to your phone not actually being charged. As long as the green light comes on the side of the charger it means it is charging! I love mine. will be buying more for other rooms of the house :)
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charging. Nikola Tesla would be so happy
customer_reviews.text: Being able to charge my phone wirelessly is GREAT. Plugging in a cord seems like a small task, but when you have to do it 2 or 3 times a day and often in the dark when you're tired at the end of the day it adds up to a real headache. Not a "I need an Advil" type headache, but... you know what I mean. Anyway, this works well, is very discrete and I just set my phone down on it, start charging and then pick it up when I'm ready to go out again. The price is right and WELL worth buying and using. I'm telling you, you'll love this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Colvin

product_meta.title: CHOETECH Wireless Charger, 10W Max Qi-Certified Fast Wireless Charging Pad Compatible with iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/X/8/8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 10/Note 10+/S20/S20+/S10+/S9, AirPods Pro
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackCHOETECH Qi Certified Wireless Charger
CHOETECH is a member of the Wireless Power Consortium.
Classic design, charging more stable.
Certified by Qi, ETL, CE, FCC, and RoHS, along with advanced temperature control, ensure a totally safe charge.

QC 2.0 & 3.0 adapter is required for Fast Charging

7.5W Fast Wireless Charging:
-iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max
-iPhone XS/XS Max/XR/ X 
-iPhone 8/ 8 Plus

10W Fast Wireless Charging: 
-Galaxy Note 10/Note 10 Plus/ S10/S10+/S10E
-Galaxy Note 9/ S9/ S9 Plus
-Galaxy Note 8 / S8/ S8 Plus
-Galaxy S7/ S7 edge/ S6 edge+/ Note 5

5W Standard Wireless Charging:
-Huawei Mate 20 Pro/ RS, Huawei P30 Pro
-Galaxy S6/S6 Edge and more Qi-enabled phones.

2.5W Cordless Charging for Apple AirPods 2 case

Models Requiring a Wireless Charging receiver(Wireless Charging receiver isn't included):
-Galaxy S5/ S4/ S3/ Note 4/3/2
-iPhone 7/7 Plus/6s/6/5s/5
-Blackberry Z30 Verizon
-Nokia Lumia 820 
-LG G3/G4

Note:
★Your device may get warmer slightly, especially when you use your device while charging, that is normal, please don't worry.
★The light on the charger itself WON'T go off if you use a charging receiver while charging.

Pakage
1*Fast Wireless Charger (No Adapter)
1*1.2m Micro USB Cable
18-Month Warranty & Friendly Customer Service
feature_bullets: 【7. 5W /10W /5W Wireless Charging】Fast wireless charge up to 10W for the Samsung Galaxy Note 10, Note 10 Plus, S10, S10 Plus, S10E, S9, S9 Plus, S8, S8 Plus, Note 9, Note 8, S7, S7 edge, S6 edge , 7.5W qi wireless charging for iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/Xs Max/XR/XS/X/8/8 Plus (Note: QC2.0/3.0 adapter needed for fast charge) and standard wireless charge for All Qi-enabled phones, AirPods 2, AirPods Pro and more.

【Safer Charging】Using highly efficient components and an advanced chipset, charging intelligently, Qi & ETL Certified, integrated smart chip inside it that resist the wireless charging pad from over-heating, over-voltage and short circuit.

【Ultra Sim & Anti-Slip】 0. 3 inches thickness, through countless data analysis, we have designed the most suitable size charging pad, which is perfect for small places but it's also big enough to put phone anywhere on it to charge, with anti-slip rubber to keep it stays in place.

【Case Friendly Design】 Our qi wireless charger can identify your phone sensitive and support phone case within 5mm(0.2 inch) while 4mm(0.16 inch) is the best wireless charging distance to charging your phone (please Note that metal attachments or credit cards will interfere with charging ).

【Easy to Carry】The slim, light weight design is travel-friendly and complements any environment.The qi wireless charger works with QI enabled device, one for all. 【What’s You Get】CHOETECH Qi Fast Wireless Charger, Micro USB Charging Cable, User Manual, Limited 18-Month and Lifetime Product Support.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars11,277 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Samsung Galaxy S10 / S10+ / S9 / S9+ / S8 / S8+ / S7 / S7 edge / S6 edge+ / Note 5 Samsung S6/S6 edge Google Nexus 7
